page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: This area is mostly undulating grassland with small copses of mainly deciduous woodland.The height above sea_level varies from 40 to 105 metres.The main occupation is{farming} with farms of from 50 to 1000 acres.The average size is 230 acres. The type of farming is mainly mixed. Most farms are{dairy farms}but the larger ones rear{beef cattle}and { sheep.}The crops which are grown are { barley,}the chief crop,{wheat}and { oats.}There is a{pig farm}and 2 { poultry farms.}The M6 motorway and the main{England _Scotland}electrified railway pass through the eastern section of the area.There are 2 farming villages{Burthwaite and Brisco and 2 dormitory villages{Durdar}and { Wreay.}There is a{race_ course and a {garden centre.}There are{2 village {inns,a hotel,and 2 petrol stations.}
